price: Allah her şeyin yaratıcısıdır. O her şeye vekildir.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٞ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu khāliqu kulli shayin wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin wakīlun
